briefTitle: Stress Ulcer Prophylaxis of Intravenous Esomeprazole in Chinese Seriously Ill Patients
officialTitle: Effect of Intravenous Esomeprazole Versus Cimetidine in Prevention of Stress Ulcer Prophylaxis in Chinese Seriously Ill Patients - a Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel-group Study
summary: The efficacy of esomeprazole will be compared versus cimetidine (a drug that previously demonstrated prevention of bleeding events) during treatment period in proportion of patients for the prevention of upper GI bleeding.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percent of Patients With Clinically Significant Upper-GI Bleeding During the Treatment Evaluation Phase
